GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on the correct word or phrase and drag it to the correct gap.

Content.Question:
1 This garment must not be dry cleaned.
2 The criminal was arrested and thrown into jail.
3 The tickets might have been stolen from my handbag.
4 Your documents will be returned to you at the end of your visit.
5 This place was discovered by my cousin Albert.
6 The painting was sold at an auction many years ago.
7 The burglary is being investigated by the police.
8 That old building hasn't been used for years.
9 My brothers were educated at the local school.
10 The film hasn't been released on DVD yet.
